name: Armorines: Project S.W.A.R.M.
overview: You have two Armorines to play as, each with their own selection of weapons. In a not distant future time, you strenuously fight against bugs of all sizes, as you attempt to impede the enemies from eliminating human civilization as we know it, and have to succeed within 120 hours. This game uses the Turok 2 engine, and has similar themes and elements to the movie Starship Troopers.
